Bash(git commit -m "Fix Prisma client import in services

Fixed critical bug where Prisma client was undefined at runtime.

Issue: Services were using named import { prisma } but prisma.ts
exports default prisma, causing ''Cannot read properties of undefined''
errors.

Fixed imports in:
- items.service.ts
- wishes.service.ts
- friends.service.ts

Changed from:
  import { prisma } from ''../utils/prisma''
To:
  import prisma from ''../utils/prisma''

This fixes the backend crash when trying to fetch items/wishes feeds.

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>")
